Package de.chojo.jdautil.interactions.slash.structure.builder

Class SlashBuilder

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.jdautil.interactions.slash.structure.builder.SlashBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuildableMetaBuilder, ExtendableRootBuilder, RootArgumentBuilder, RootMetaBuilder
public class SlashBuilder extends Object implements RootArgumentBuilder, ExtendableRootBuilder, RootMetaBuilder, BuildableMetaBuilder
Class which allows to create grouped commands. The limitations are implemented as defined here
